verses.verse: And this is the law <WH8451> of the trespass-offering <WH817>: it is most <WH6944> holy <WH6944>.

In the place <WH4725> where they kill <WH7819> the burnt-offering <WH5930> shall they kill <WH7819> the trespass-offering <WH817>; and the blood <WH1818> thereof shall he sprinkle <WH2236> upon the altar <WH4196> round about <WH5439>.
And he shall offer <WH7126> of it all the fat <WH2459> thereof <WH451>: the fat tail, and the fat <WH2459> that covereth <WH3680> the inwards <WH7130>,

and the two <WH8147> kidneys <WH3629>, and the fat <WH2459> that is on them <WH3689>, which is by the loins, and the caul <WH3508> upon the liver <WH3516>, with the kidneys <WH3629>, shall he take away <WH5493>;
and the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> them upon the altar <WH4196> for an offering made by fire <WH801> unto Jehovah <WH3068>: it is a trespass-offering <WH817>.
Every male <WH2145> among the priests <WH3548> shall eat <WH398> thereof <WH398>: it shall be eaten in a holy <WH6918> place <WH4725>: it is most <WH6944> holy <WH6944>.
As is the sin-offering <WH2403>, so is the trespass-offering <WH817>; there is one <WH259> law <WH8451> for them <WH3548>: the priest that maketh atonement therewith <WH3722>, he shall have it.

And the priest <WH3548> that offereth <WH7126> any man <WH376>'s burnt-offering <WH5930>, even the priest <WH3548> shall have to himself the skin <WH5785> of the burnt-offering <WH5930> which he hath offered <WH7126>.

And every meal-offering <WH4503> that is baken <WH644> in the oven <WH8574>, and all that is dressed <WH6213> in the frying-pan <WH4802>, and on the baking-pan <WH4227>, shall be the priest <WH3548>'s that offereth it <WH7126>.
And every meal-offering <WH4503>, mingled <WH1101> with oil <WH8081>, or dry <WH2720>, shall all the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> have <WH376>, one as well as another <WH251>.
And this is the law <WH8451> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace-offerings <WH8002>, which one shall offer <WH7126> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

If he offer <WH7126> it for a thanksgiving <WH8426>, then he shall offer <WH7126> with the sacrifice <WH2077> of thanksgiving <WH8426> unleavened <WH4682> cakes <WH2471> mingled <WH1101> with oil <WH8081>, and unleavened <WH4682> wafers <WH7550> anointed <WH4886> with oil <WH8081>, and cakes <WH2471> mingled <WH1101> with oil <WH8081>, of fine flour <WH5560> soaked <WH7246>.
With cakes <WH2471> of leavened <WH2557> bread <WH3899> he shall offer <WH7126> his oblation <WH7133> with the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace-offerings <WH2077> for thanksgiving <WH8426>.

And of it he shall offer <WH7126> one <WH259> out of each oblation <WH7133> for a heave-offering <WH8641> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; it shall be the priest <WH3548>'s that sprinkleth <WH2236> the blood <WH1818> of the peace-offerings <WH8002>.

And the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace-offerings <WH8002> for thanksgiving <WH8426> shall be eaten <WH398> on the day <WH3117> of his oblation <WH7133>; he shall not leave <WH3240> any of it until the morning <WH1242>.

But if the sacrifice <WH2077> of his oblation <WH7133> be a vow <WH5088>, or a freewill-offering <WH5071>, it shall be eaten <WH398> on the day <WH3117> that he offereth <WH7126> his sacrifice <WH2077>; and on the morrow <WH4283> that which remaineth <WH3498> of it shall be eaten <WH398>:
but that which remaineth <WH3498> of the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> on the third <WH7992> day <WH3117> shall be burnt <WH8313> with fire <WH784>.

And if any of the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace-offerings <WH8002> be eaten <WH398> on <WH398> the third <WH7992> day <WH3117>, it shall not be accepted <WH7521>, neither shall it be imputed <WH2803> unto him that offereth <WH7126> it <WH6292>: it shall be an abomination, and the soul <WH5315> that eateth <WH398> of it shall bear <WH5375> his iniquity <WH5771>.

And the flesh <WH1320> that toucheth <WH5060> any unclean <WH2931> thing shall not be eaten <WH398>; it shall be burnt <WH8313> with fire <WH784>. And as for the flesh <WH1320>, every one that is clean <WH2889> shall eat thereof <WH398>:

but the soul <WH5315> that eateth <WH398> of the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace-offerings <WH8002>, that pertain unto Jehovah <WH3068>, having his uncleanness <WH2932> upon him <WH5315>, that soul shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people <WH5971>.

And when any one <WH5315> shall touch <WH5060> any unclean <WH2932> thing <WH2932>, the uncleanness of man <WH120>, or an unclean <WH2931> beast <WH929>, or any unclean <WH2931> abomination <WH8263>, and eat <WH398> of the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace-offerings <WH2077>, which pertain unto Jehovah <WH3068>, that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people <WH5971>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,
Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, Ye shall eat <WH398> no fat <WH2459>, of ox <WH7794>, or sheep <WH3775>, or goat <WH5795>.

And the fat <WH2459> of that which dieth of itself <WH5038>, and the fat <WH2459> of that which is torn of beasts <WH2966>, may be used <WH6213> for any other service <WH4399>; but ye shall in no wise <WH398> eat of it <WH398>.

For whosoever eateth <WH398> the fat <WH2459> of the beast <WH929>, of which men offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire <WH801> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, even the soul <WH5315> that eateth <WH398> it shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people <WH5971>.
And ye shall eat <WH398> no manner of blood <WH1818>, whether it be of bird <WH5775> or of beast <WH929>, in any of your dwellings <WH4186>.
Whosoever <WH5315> it be that eateth <WH398> any <WH3605> blood <WH1818>, that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people <WH5971>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, He that offereth <WH7126> the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace-offerings <WH8002> unto Jehovah <WH3068> shall bring <WH935> his oblation <WH7133> unto Jehovah <WH3068> out of the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace-offerings <WH2077>:

his own hands <WH3027> shall bring <WH935> the offerings <WH801> of Jehovah <WH3068> made by fire <WH801>; the fat <WH2459> with the breast <WH2373> shall he bring <WH935>, that the breast <WH2373> may be waved <WH5130> for a wave-offering <WH8573> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>.
And the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> the fat <WH2459> upon the altar <WH4196>; but the breast <WH2373> shall be Aaron <WH175>'s and his sons <WH1121>'.
And the right <WH3225> thigh <WH7785> shall ye give <WH5414> unto the priest <WH3548> for a heave-offering <WH8641> out of the sacrifices <WH2077> of your peace-offerings <WH8641>.

He among the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> that offereth <WH7126> the blood <WH1818> of the peace-offerings <WH8002>, and the fat <WH2459>, shall have the right <WH3225> thigh <WH7785> for a portion <WH4490>.

For the <WH2373> wave-breast <WH8573> and the heave8641, 7785 - thigh have I taken <WH3947> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> out of the sacrifices <WH2077> of their peace-offerings <WH8002>, and have given <WH5414> them unto Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> and unto his sons <WH1121> as their portion <WH2706> for ever <WH5769> from the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

This is the anointing-portion <WH4888> of Aaron <WH175>, and the anointing-portion <WH4888> of his sons <WH1121>, out of the offerings <WH801> of Jehovah <WH3068> made by fire <WH801>, in the day <WH3117> when he presented <WH7126> them to minister unto Jehovah <WH3068> in the priest <WH3547>'s office;

which Jehovah <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> to be given <WH5414> them of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, in the day <WH3117> that he anointed <WH4886> them <WH2708>. It is their portion for ever <WH5769> throughout their generations <WH1755>.

This is the law <WH8451> of the burnt-offering <WH5930>, of the meal-offering <WH4503>, and of the sin-offering <WH5930>, and of the trespass-offering <WH817>, and of the consecration <WH4394>, and of the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace-offerings <WH817>;

which Jehovah <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> in mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>, in the day <WH3117> that he commanded <WH6680> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> to offer <WH7126> their oblations <WH7133> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>.
